sentences.en: 95% of patients know their obsessions are irrational.
sentences.cn: 95％的病人都知道他们的痴迷是不理智的。

sentences.en: A desire cannot, in itself, be either rational or irrational.
sentences.cn: 欲望本身无合理或不合理可言.

sentences.en: After taking the drug she became completely irrational.
sentences.cn: 她在吸毒后变得完全失去了理性.

sentences.en: He had an irrational belief that everybody was his enemy.
sentences.cn: 他有个荒谬的信念,以为人人都是他的仇敌.
他变得越来越不可理喻了。

sentences.en: His behaviour was becoming increasingly irrational.
sentences.cn: 他的行为变得越来越不理智了。

sentences.en: I felt a wave of irrational guilt and fear.
sentences.cn: 我突然产生了一阵莫名其妙的犯罪感和恐惧心.

sentences.en: It was so unlike him to yield to such an irrational impulse!
sentences.cn: 他如此冲动,如此不顾理智,实在有失常态.

sentences.en: It's just irrational , but suits yourselt.
sentences.cn: 这真是荒唐无稽, 但也正符合你的性格.

sentences.en: She had her irrational moment but she was also kindly.
sentences.cn: 她也有生气的时候,但她是好心肠.

sentences.en: She was prey to irrational fears.
sentences.cn: 她遭受着无端恐惧的折磨.

sentences.en: Strong irrational dislikes of other people can easily be picked up from others.
sentences.cn: 对他人无端的厌恶之情别人可以轻易察觉到。

sentences.en: The logical definition of the irrational number is rather sophisticated.
sentences.cn: 无理数的逻辑主义是颇有些不自然的.

sentences.en: The rational and the irrational complement each other. Individually, they are far less powerful.
sentences.cn: 理性和非理性是互补的。两者分开的话，力量就会小很多。

sentences.en: The weight of irrational guilt pressed on her.
sentences.cn: 无端的负罪感压得她喘不过气来。

sentences.en: Their actions may be qualified as irrational.
sentences.cn: 他们的行动可视为无理性的.

words.tran_cn: 不合理的；无理性的；荒谬的

trans.tran_cn: 不合理的，荒谬的，无理性的，[数]无理的
trans.tran_en: not based on clear thought or reason
